testcase.purpose: Check if formdata.append method exists
Check if the XMLHttpRequest.upload exists
Check if xmlhttprequest.abort method exists
Check if XMLHttpRequest.DONE exists
Check if the type of XMLHttpRequest.DONE is 'number'
Check if XMLHttpRequest Level2 has getAllResponseHeaders method
Check if xmlhttprequest.getResponseHeader method exits
Check if XMLHttpRequest.HEADERS_RECEIVED exists
Check if the type of XMLHttpRequest.HEADERS_RECEIVED is 'number'

Check if the type of XMLHttpRequest.LOADING is 'number'
Check if XMLHttpRequestEventTarget.onabort exists
Check if the onabort event occurs when the request abort
Check if XMLHttpRequestEventTarget.onerror exists
Check if the onerror event occurs when the request fail
Check if XMLHttpRequestEventTarget.onload exists
Check if the onload event occurs when the request complete
Check if the XMLHttpRequestEventTarget.onloadend exists
Check if the onloadend event occurs when the request complete
Check if the XMLHttpRequestEventTarget.onloadstart exists
Check if the onloadstart event occurs event when the request start
Check if the XMLHttpRequestEventTarget.onprogress exists
Check if the onprogress event occurs when sending and loading data
Check if the XMLHttpRequest.onreadystatechange exists
Check if the onreadystatechange event occurs when The readyState attribute changes at some seemingly arbitrary times for historical reasons
Check if XMLHttpRequestEventTarget.ontimeout exists
Check if the ontimeout event occurs when the author specified timeout has passed before the request could complete
